subject: Football
lead_paragraph: At 6 feet 4 inches and 265 pounds, Brandon Jacobs has always been an imposing figure in the backfield, but beginning his second tour as a Giants player, he arrived chastened.
snippet: At 6 feet 4 inches and 265 pounds, Brandon Jacobs has always been an imposing figure in the backfield, but beginning his second tour as a Giants player, he arrived chastened.
